column4: i alsways have problem with unraring. i am trying to extract a file from a multi part rar file. although the file is not password protected it sometimes asks for password and sometimes deletes the file it has extracted just after it is done extracting. is this a common problem?
i have never had that issue. what are you using to unrar?
ah. ive always used the command line tools
theyre in your ~ dir , probably in .mozilla  ... why not keep ~ entirely?
